rule: All part of speech tags utilized in the output must be from a non-specified list.
input: sentence: They cross the river quickly. word: quickly
validity:
The input provides a complete sentence: "They cross the river quickly." This fulfills the first part of the input specification, which requires a complete sentence.

The input also specifies the word "quickly" from the sentence for analysis. This satisfies the second part of the input specification, which requires the input to include a single specified word from the sentence for analysis. 

Both conditions set out in the input specification are directly met.

No violation.
OK
